* aesthetics added at the geom level 


```{r}
#| message: false
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
mpg |>
  ggplot(aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) + 
  geom_point(aes(color = class))

```
* Some misc script 
```{r}
df <- tribble(
    ~id, ~measurement, ~value,
    "A", "bp1", 100,
    "A", "bp1", 102,
    "A", "bp2", 120,
    "B", "bp1", 140,
    "B", "bp2", 115
  ) 

df |>
    group_by(id, measurement) |>
    summarize(count = n()) |>
  group_vars()

```

```{r}
mpg |>
  # ggplot(aes(x = displ, y = hwy)) +
  ggplot(aes(x = displ,y = hwy)) +
  geom_point(aes( color = class)) + 
  # facet_wrap(~class) + 
  theme_minimal()
```
